raw_body:
GODAGE – KALYANANDA (NANDA) – Retired Additional Secretary,​ Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the former Ambassador to Belgium and the European Union passed away peacefully. Remains will lie at Jayarathna Respect Home from 8 a.m. to 4.30 p.m. on Friday March 08,​ 2024 with the Cremation at 5 p.m. at the General Cemetery Kanatte.
016515
